meanings.definition: To set to a starting value or condition.
meanings.sent1: The teacher initializes the computer before the lesson.
meanings.sent2: She always initializes her phone before using it.
meanings.sent3: The robot initializes its systems before starting its tasks.
meanings.sent4: The chef initializes the oven, ready to bake the cake.
meanings.sent5: He carefully initializes the machine to avoid any errors.

meanings.sent1: The technician initializes the equipment for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Before the show, the crew initializes the stage lights.
meanings.sent3: The explorer initializes his gear for the upcoming adventure.
meanings.sent4: She initializes her tools, getting ready for the project.
meanings.sent5: The team initializes the software to ensure smooth operation.
